SELECT l.id, l.parentId, l.externalId, l.type, l.base_map, l.dataprovider_id,
l.name, l.url, l.locale,
l.opacity, l.style, l.minscale, l.maxscale,
l.legend_image, l.metadataId,
l.params, l.options, l.attributes, l.capabilities,
l.gfi_xslt, l.gfi_type, l.gfi_content, l.realtime, l.refresh_rate, l.username, l.password, l.version, l.srs_name, m.wkt as geom,
l.created, l.updated, gl.order_number,
l.capabilities_last_updated, l.capabilities_update_rate_sec
FROM oskari_maplayer l LEFT OUTER JOIN oskari_maplayer_metadata m ON m.metadataid = l.metadataId LEFT OUTER JOIN oskari_maplayer_group_link gl ON gl.maplayerid = l.id WHERE l.id = #id# OR l.parentId = #id# ORDER BY l.parentId ASC

sqlMap.statement: delete from oskari_maplayer where parentId=#id# AND parentId <> -1; delete from oskari_maplayer where id=#id#;

insert into oskari_maplayer ( parentId, type, base_map, dataprovider_id,
name, url, locale,
opacity, style, minscale, maxscale,
legend_image, metadataId,
params, options, attributes, capabilities,
gfi_xslt, gfi_type, gfi_content,
realtime, refresh_rate,
username, password,
version, srs_name,
created, updated,
capabilities_last_updated, capabilities_update_rate_sec)
values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE oskari_maplayer_group_link SET order_number = #orderNumber# WHERE maplayerid = #layerId# AND groupid = #groupId#
update oskari_maplayer_group_link set groupid = #newGroupId# where groupid = #oldGroupId# and maplayerid = #layerId#
